snippet: The Los Angeles Police Department is examining pages of newly released church files detailing decades of sexual abuse by Roman Catholic priests to determine if any new criminal charges could be brought.
abstract: Los Angeles Police Department is examining thousands of pages of newly released church files detailing decades of sexual abuse by Roman Catholic priests to determine if any new criminal charges could be brought.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Police Department is examining pages of newly released church files detailing decades of sexual abuse by Roman Catholic priests to determine if any new criminal charges could be brought.
